Description: Receptionist At Fitness And Yoga CenterRequirements:Greet clients, answer calls and provide accurate information about our services in a friendly and professional manner.Maintain smooth functioning of the company by supporting in-house members with general organizational tasks as per requirement.Answer, screen, and forward incoming phone calls.Inform interested and appropriate persons about the company's basic details through various communication modes.Undertake other duties of a similar professional nature and commensurate with the role at the request.We offer:-Basic salary based on experience-Working in a clean and comfortable studio in the center of Dubai (DIFC).-Working in a friendly team.-Warm atmosphere and smiles of grateful guests.Skills
Skills: Language: • English (Required). • Arabic (Preferred).Solid written and verbal communication skills.Fluent in English ( knowing Arabic is also beneficial) Ability to manage in-house activities by applying suitable time management and scheduling strategies.Sales experience preferred.Multitasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.Lover of sports and fitness.
